content: **crochet baby blanket in drops muskat soft** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **measurements** approx 68 x 86 cm 26 ¾ x 33 7/8 **materials** drops muskat soft from garnstudio 500 g color no 01 pink mix or no 03 blue mix drops crochet hook size 5 mm h/8 or size needed to get 1 diamond = approx 16 x 16 cm 6 ¼ x 6 ¼ **pattern links ** french version 1 click here 2 to see the blue version of this blanket 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b16&d_id=18 2 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=4861&cid=17
